title: And Another Angel Came out of the Temple Which Is in Heaven, and He Also Having a Sharp Sickle (Et un autre ange sortit du temple qui est au ciel, ayant lui aussi une faucille tranchante) from Apocalypse of Saint John (Apocalypse de Saint-Jean)
medium: Lithograph with chine collé from a portfolio of 13 lithographs (12 with chine collé)
credits: Gift of The Ian Woodner Family Collection
